title: Go'ing Insane Part One: Endless Error Handling – Pursuit Of Laziness – A blog by Jesse Duffield
description: I’ve been using Go for a few years now, mostly in my open source project Lazygit. In my day job I use Ruby and Typescript, and I’ve also spent some time with Rust. Each of those languages have design quirks that can grind a developer’s gears, and although my own precious gears have been ground by every language I’ve used, Go is the only language that has made me feel indignant.
